name: Tumblr - Logo - Merlin
description: Replaces the regular Tumblr logo with the Merlin logo
additional_info: Tumblr Post if you want to share: [x] 11/1/2014 - Updated to fit new Dashboard layout 4/8/2015 - Updated to work with new header layout
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.tumblr.com"), url-prefix("https://www.tumblr.com") { .logo .logo-anchor:before { content: " " !important; } .logo .logo-anchor { height: 52px !important; width: 208px !important; margin: 0px 30px!important; display: block !important; background-size: auto 52px !important; background-image: url(https://static.tumblr.com/gwc9rra/Zsanecf6t/logo-merlin.png) !important; content: " " !important; } svg.svg-logo, .logo .png-logo, .logo .preload-container { display: none !important; } }

discussions.name: I'll bet that wasn't easy to do
